entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Sparwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 a.m. PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

Observed at: Sparwood Airport 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
